Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for x86-64 Containers) 2020.3 (Build 221U)

Class.name: CodeSpaghetti.Tests.ParserTests
Class.Description: A class to test the Parser class

Method.name: TestParseLabelPublicBasic
Method.Implementation: Set line = "Begin()[]Public" Set result = ##class(CodeSpaghetti.Core.Parser).ParseLabel(line,1) Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Name,"Begin","Label name = Begin") Do $$$AssertTrue(result.IsPublic,"Label is public") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Parameters.Count(),0,"No parameters") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.PublicVariables.Count(),0,"No public parameters")

Method.name: TestParseLabelPublicBasicSpaced
Method.Implementation: Set line = "Begin() [] Public" Set result = ##class(CodeSpaghetti.Core.Parser).ParseLabel(line,1) Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Name,"Begin","Label name = Begin") Do $$$AssertTrue(result.IsPublic,"Label is public") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Parameters.Count(),0,"No parameters") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.PublicVariables.Count(),0,"No public parameters")

Method.name: TestParseLabelPrivateBasic
Method.Implementation: Set line = "Begin()[]Public" Set result = ##class(CodeSpaghetti.Core.Parser).ParseLabel(line,1) Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Name,"Begin","Label name = Begin") Do $$$AssertNotTrue(result.IsPublic,"Label is private") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Parameters.Count(),0,"No parameters") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.PublicVariables.Count(),0,"No public parameters")

Method.name: TestParseLabelPrivateBasicSpaced
Method.Implementation: Set line = "Begin() [] Public" Set result = ##class(CodeSpaghetti.Core.Parser).ParseLabel(line,1) Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Name,"Begin","Label name = Begin") Do $$$AssertNotTrue(result.IsPublic,"Label is private") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.Parameters.Count(),0,"No parameters") Do $$$AssertEquals(result.PublicVariables.Count(),0,"No public parameters")
